title: Verify Enrollment for Insurance
description: A student needs an official letter verifying their full-time enrollment status for their parent's health insurance company.

tasks.description: Identify the student and check their current enrollment status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student is enrolled full-time for the current semester.

tasks.description: Generate a standardized enrollment verification letter from the SIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the official PDF letter.

tasks.description: Email the verification letter to the student.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully emails the document to the student's official university address.
